document.heading: Department of Health Care Finance Establishment Act of 2007

history.narrative: Law 17-109, the “Department of Health Care Finance Establishment Act of 2007”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-76 which was referred to the Committee on Health. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 6, 2007, and December 11, 2007, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-227 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-109 became effective on February 27, 2008.
